sect1.title: Root Properties
sect1.para: Root properties are only allowed in the first node of a GSGFGameTree.

sect2.title: AP (Application)
sect2.para: The first value denotes the application, the second one the version. Both values are treated as opaque.

sect2.title: CA (Charset)
sect2.para: The charset of the SGF file. Note that this will always be the string "UTF-8" because all SGF files are converted to UTF-8 by this library.

sect2.title: FF (File Format)
sect2.para: The number must be a positive number greater than zero. When writing, this number will always be 4. When reading, the number is ignored.

sect2.title: GM (Game Type)
sect2.para: The number must be a positive number greater than zero. You can get a list of well-known game types from http://www.red-bean.com/sgf/properties.html#GM.

sect2.title: ST (Variation Style)
sect2.para: Bit mask that determines how variations are shown. Valid values are in the range 0-3.

sect2.title: SZ (Board size)
sect2.para: Number of columns (first value) and rows (second value) of the board. Contrary to the SGF specification, the same value for columns and rows is allowed. In this case a single GSGFNumber is used instead of a GSGFComposed.
